newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Yield 5.4967 pct on Portuguese 182-day bills.
newsitem.headline: Yield 5.4967 pct on Portuguese 182-day bills.

text.p: The average yield rose to 5.4967 percent, from 5.4868 percent previously, at the Institute for Public Credit Management's sale of 182-day bills, the Bank of Portugal said.
